summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3824 for the improvement of Juneau Street, from 46th Avenue South to 48th Avenue South; by grading and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 46957, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
